name: Event Reminder
description: Sent to remind users of upcoming events
subject: Reminder: Upcoming Event
htmlContent:
Event Reminder

Hello {{recipientName}},

This is a reminder about your upcoming event:

Event: {{eventTitle}}

Date: {{date}}

Time: {{startTime}} - {{endTime}}

Location: {{location}}

Notes: {{notes}}

We look forward to seeing you!

Best regards,
Smart Scheduler Team
